title: Azure or Amazon AWS infrastructure
extract: Compute, storage, databases and networking. For compute, AWS' main offering is its EC2 instances, which can be tailored with a large number of options. It also provides related services such as Elastic Beanstalk for app deployment, the EC2 Container service, AWS Lambda and Autoscaling.May 3, 2018
extract_html: Compute, storage, databases and networking. For compute, AWS' main offering is its EC2 instances, which can be tailored with a large number of options. It also provides related services such as Elastic Beanstalk for app deployment, the EC2 Container service, AWS Lambda and Autoscaling.May 3, 2018
